EmailTemplate.name: Grad Reps TBC West Midlands 2015
EmailTemplate.subject: Ignite - The Black Country
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Welcome to the Grad Reps team!
Over the course of the Summer you were elected to keep your teams up to date with the latest opportunities.
We are kick starting our Challenge Society year with Ignite and we would like your help to get as many people there as possible.
If you are still interested in taking on this role and being in with a chance to win Â£50 vouchers please contact vicky.harrold@the-challenge.org
www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/ignite-the-black-country-tickets-19492850641
